name: AXMFiHearingDevice
desc: A namespace for hearing device accessibility symbols in Swift.

items.name: struct AXMFiHearingDevice.Ear
items.desc: Constants that represent a hearing device ear.

items.name: static let streamingEarDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that the system posts when there's a change to which ears enable streaming.

items.name: static func supportsBidirectionalStreaming() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the iOS device supports bidirectional streaming.

items.name: static func pairedDeviceIdentifiers() -> [UUID]
items.desc: Returns the UUIDs of the hearing device peripherals.

items.name: static let pairedUUIDsDidChangeNotification: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that the system posts when there's a change to the UUIDs of the hearing device peripherals.
